sk1.name: Burrowstrike
sk1.desc: Sand King burrows into the ground and tunnels forward, damaging and stunning enemy units above him as he resurfaces.

sk2.name: Sand Storm
sk2.desc: CHANNELED - Sand King creates a fearsome sandstorm that damages enemy units while hiding him from vision. The invisibility remains for a short duration after the sandstorm ends.

sk3.name: Caustic Finale
sk3.desc: Sand King's attacks inject a venom that causes enemy units to explode violently upon death, spreading area damage.Caustic Finale is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.

sk4.name: Epicenter
sk4.desc: CHANNELED - After channeling for 2 seconds, Sand King sends a disturbance into the earth, causing it to shudder violently. All enemies caught within range will take damage and become slowed. Each subsequent pulse increases the radius of damage dealt.Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
